titles.title: A bill to provide for the transfer of funds to carry out the financing functions of the Small Business Administration under section 7(a) of the Small Business Act.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5181)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 4/29/1993--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA) to: (1) initiate established procedures for the transfer of unobligated funds appropriated to the SBA for carrying out the small business guaranteed loan program authorized under the Small Business Act; and (2) submit a request for such transfer to the Senate Appropriations Committee. Directs the SBA, until July 1, 1993, to continue to receive and process applications for such assistance.
